from datetime import datetime
tmp ={}
chart = {"series":[],"data":[],"labels":[]}
data =[]

import_data = msg["payload"]["feeds"]
for val in import_data:
    datetime_obj = datetime.strptime(val["created_at"], '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ')
    timestamp = (datetime_obj - datetime(1970, 1, 1)).total_seconds()
    # timestamp = datetime_obj.timestamp()
    if val["field1"] != None:
        data.append({"x":val["created_at"],"y":float(val["field1"].replace('"',''))})

chart["series"] = ["A"]
chart["labels"] = [""]

chart["data"] = [data]
tmp["payload"] = [chart]
return tmp

from datetime import datetime
tmp ={}
chart = {"series":[],"data":[],"labels":[]}
data =[]

import_data = msg["payload"]["feeds"]
for val in import_data:
    datetime_obj = datetime.strptime(val["created_at"], '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ')
    timestamp = (datetime_obj - datetime(1970, 1, 1)).total_seconds()
    # timestamp = datetime_obj.timestamp()
    if val["field2"] != None:
        data.append({"x":val["created_at"],"y":float(val["field2"].replace('"',''))})

chart["series"] = ["A"]
chart["labels"] = [""]

chart["data"] = [data]
tmp["payload"] = [chart]
return tmp

'July', 'August', 'September', 'October', 'November', 'December']

    _cons.append(_dict[month])
# for key, value in _dict.items():
#     _cons.append(value)
#     _month.append(key)
    
tmp['payload'] = [{
    "series": ["temp1"],
    "data": [_cons],
    "labels": _month
}];
    
tmp["cons"] = _cons
tmp["month"] = _month
return tmp

years =[]
for i in range(10):
    years.append(year - i)
msg["options"] = years
return msg
